TopicTitle: How to add something into a current rocket

Articles.Content: Hi, if i want to make lets say a base in the mun or something, and i have builded the actual part of the base (lets say a hangar) what can i use to instert it to a rocket that i have done? i do not want to re build the whole thing. (i have not done that but lets say i may do it) how can i 'insert' the payload on the rocket without having to rebuild the rocket on the payload or the payload on the rocket?

There is no way to do this stock however if you don't mind mods you'll want to download the subassembly saver/loader. It hasn't been updated to 0.20 yet but there is a fix here. I don't know if you would need the rest of the download as well, however if you do that is here. It basically enables you to save parts of a rocket. so you could save a launcher, build a new payload then load the launcher into the same file attach it then you are ready to go.
This is planned to be part of the base game in the future, but right now that mod is the only way.
